order_create_time,
user_id,

#{orderCreateTime},
#{userId},
#{merchantId},
#{trackType},
#{operateNo},

select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
UPDATE so_track
order_code = #{orderCode},
order_create_time = #{orderCreateTime},
user_id = #{userId},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
track_type = #{trackType},
operate_no = #{operateNo},
operate_attr = #{operateAttr},
operate_content = #{operateContent},
remark = #{remark},
operate_type = #{operateType},
operator_id = #{operatorId},
operator_name = #{operatorName},
source_system = #{sourceSystem},
track_level = #{trackLevel},
delivery_company_id = #{deliveryCompanyId},
delivery_company_name = #{deliveryCompanyName},
delivery_company_short_name = #{deliveryCompanyShortName},
delivery_company_url = #{deliveryCompanyUrl},
delivery_express_nbr = #{deliveryExpressNbr},
deliverier_name = #{deliverierName},
deliverier_mobile = #{deliverierMobile},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
WHERE id = #{id}
